channel.title: 2 problems
channel.description:
1: NPC's on my server can walk through anything, is there a way to fix it so they can't 'noclip'?
2: how would i add a gfx on the other player with a special attack (i.e. zammy godsword spec does barrage gfx on the other player)
thanks :)

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I have no idea then.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

the npc range thing doesnt work, i mean the npcs will walk around in that area, but once they’re attacked they go outside the area

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

#1 - For NPC’s, go to your autospawn.cfg, and the last 2 set of Coords after the Height, should be changed to the same ones where the NPC is on the autospawn.cfg

spawn = npcid	coordx	coordy	0	coordx	coordy	coordx	coordy	2	NPCNAME

Change all the coords to the same thing.

#2 - Under the Spec animation, add this:

stillgfx(gfx#, absY, absX);

Change the gfx# to Barrage.

It might work, Not sure because I’ve never tried this one :S

Read full topic
